page.title: 20BROUGHTY FERRY'S CHURCHES
page.content:
Broughty Ferry has ten churches.Six of them are Church of Scotland.These are St.Aidan's,East Church,St.James'(known as the Fishermen's Church),St. Luke's St.Margaret's (Barnhill) and St. Stephen's and West.All these churches were built during the 19th century,and St.Luke's and St.Stephen's have fine stained glass in them. Other churches in Broughty Ferry are St.Mary's Episcopal Church,Our Lady of Good Counsel,Roman Catholic Church,the Congregational Union Church and the Baptist Church. All Churches are well attended and people of other faiths e.g. Jewish, Muslim,Mormon,meet in nearby Dundee.
The Broughty Ferry entry for the Domesday Project was prepared by pupils of Barnhill and Forthill Primary Schools.
